title.description: The title of the assessment (e.g., 'Derivatives and anti-derivatives').

set.description: Which assessmentSet this one belongs to (e.g., 'Homework', 'Practice Quiz').

number.description: The number of this assessment within the set (e.g., '1', '2R', '3B').

multipleInstance.description: Whether to allow students to create additional instances of the assessment

shuffleQuestions.description: Whether the questions will be shuffled in the student

allowAccess.description: List of access rules for the assessment. Access is permitted if any access rule is satisfied.

text.description: HTML text shown on the assessment overview page.

maxPoints.description: The maximum number of points that can be earned for this assessment.

autoClose.description: Whether to automatically close the assessment after a period of inactivity.

zones.description: Array of "zones" in the assessment, each containing questions that can be randomized within the zone.

allowReview.description: Whether to allow students to view their questions and answers when the assessment is closed.

accessRule.description: An access rule that permits people to access this assessment. All restrictions in the rule must be satisfied for the rule to allow access.

mode.description: The server mode required for access.

role.description: The minimum user role required for access.

uids.description: A list of UIDs (like 'username@example.com', one of which is required for access

credit.description: How much credit is awarded for doing the homework, as a percentage (100 means full credit).

startDate.description: The earliest date on which access is permitted.

endDate.description: The latest date on which access is permitted.

timeLimitMin.description: The time limit to complete the assessment, in minutes.

title.description: Zone title, displayed to the students at the top of the question list for the zone.

numberChoose.description: Number of questions to choose from this zone.

questions.description: Array of questions in the zone.

alternatives.description: Array of question alternatives to choose from.

numberChoose.description: Number of questions to choose from this group.

questionId.description: Question ID (directory name of the question).
